detailsData.title: Experienced Professionals
detailsData.content: Senior partners Howard Goldman and Caroline G. Harris have almost eight decades of experience in New York City land use. They have worked in the Counsel’s Office of the Department of City Planning and some of the City’s leading law firms.

detailsData.title: Specialized Expertise
detailsData.content: The firm focuses on zoning and land use in the five boroughs of New York City. They are well-versed in the intricacies of zoning and land use regulations and provide practical advice.

detailsData.title: Client-Centric Approach
detailsData.content: GoldmanHarris is known for being proactive and responsive. They provide excellent guidance and counsel, and are detail-oriented and very knowledgeable.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Services
detailsData.content: The firm offers a wide range of services including zoning due diligence, zoning lot development agreements, and the application process with various governmental agencies. They handle as-of-right and discretionary approvals in New York City.

address: 475 Park Avenue South, Suite 2803, New York, NY 10016
subHeading: Zoning, Land Use and Landmark Preservation in New York City
valueProp: GoldmanHarris LLC is a boutique law firm focusing on zoning and land use in the five boroughs of New York City. Development is a collaborative process, involving owners, developers, architects, lawyers, engineers, consultants, lenders, public officials, and others. The professionals at GoldmanHarris are all veterans of the City’s development process.
